description:
A helpless 16 year old pervert and average teenager with many friends, he is unknowingly the Destiny Transformer who is meant to change the world. He enjoys taking care of kids like Neneko and Mone. He is a pervert and unknowingly he shows it very much. Though he is kind, he is lazy and does not enjoy studying. His parents died at a young age, he lives with his guardian, Nanase. He has a crush on Mizuki and doesn`t like when Ishikari-sensei acts perverted toward her and Mone.
His ability in Moera (the dream world) is to transfer power. This can be his own power, or others he`s physically connected with.
The scientific name of this ability is "Indefinite Quantum Selection Support Technique".
name: Mikuri Tomokazu
